The area=
 that Salveo and his team=A0approached was a short distance from the Ark, i=
n a place that would one day be=A0the bustling metropolis of Portland, Oreg=
on. However now it is the scene of an aftermath, the signs of a recent=A0ba=
ttle can been seen, judging by the=A0burnt and scortched landscape,=A0and t=
he=A0smoking and burned out frames of sweeps and other mechs that=A0litter =
the ground like=A0refuse. 

The ground vibrated as the shuttle touched down=
, evidence of some siezmic activity taking place nearby. 

"I am inside the=
 Ark." came Lord Elder's response, "Becareful, there is some sort of subsur=
face activity going on." Elder paused before continuing, "I am attempting t=
o bring sensors online, but it will take some time."

Meanwhile, in the dis=
tance Legacy's dark form appeared over the horizon as he flew toward the Ar=
k in robot mode.
